summary: I'm a technology enthusiast that loves creating things and learning new frameworks and languages. I'm looking for a team environment to learn from and share knowledge of interesting technologies and applications.

duties.description: Assisted in the architecture, design and development of bespoke CMS system for marketing that leveraged web component-like slot design for drag and drop nested componentry
Led re-architecture, redesign and development of subscription and notification admin system to improve end user productivity to be able to meet regulatory requirements
Work with multiple product owners and project managers to align business goals with technologies to meet business needs
Managed a team of developers to meet tight deadlines on multiple projects, often with near simultaneous production delivery
Led architecture and development of proof-of-concept consumer portal using React for real-time data synchronization and offline to online cache and re-sync capabilities on Amazon Web Services (AWS)
Led architecture and development of multiple consumer-facing and crew-facing React UIs within a constrained, embedded solution for IoT soft-drink machines

Assisted in the architecture and development of a Polymer.js digital menu board solution through a self-service portal, integrating with an existing third-party portal through Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
Led architecture and development of prototype hardware statistical dashboard with peer-to-peer user scenario testing using websockets
Led architecture and development of real-time single-page application (SPA) to configure multiple pieces of converged infrastructure using bespoke DSL language and job engine
Led architecture and development of a multi-tenant SPA to monitor thousands of Virtual Machines (VM) using websockets to communicate with cross-platform services
Assisted in the architecture and development of Node.js client/server library to perform cross-language service discovery
Led architecture and development of multiple Node.js microservices to handle service requests from incoming MQ messages such as hardware and VM provisioning

Led architecture and development of dynamic layout framework allowing for drag-and-drop of components, resizing content for responsive-like re-flowing and configurable charts for customizable dashboard
Led architecture and development of an in-browser code editor to maintain a collection of data-driven components with live preview
Assisted in architecture and development of mobile web application to deliver near real-time trading data to iOS, Android and BlackBerry devices
Led architecture and development of mobile chat application for real- time trader updates
Led architecture and development of embedded, real-time trading position application
Assisted in the architecture and development of applications for time tracking, candidate job portal and job application tracking
Led in architecture and development of several Java-based web applications
